ars_nouveau.book.color_augment.title: Color Frequency
ars_nouveau.book.color_augment.page1: EnderStorages work on a network based on color frequencies. To attune your spells to this network, you need to augment them with these Color Frequency Glyphs.
ars_nouveau.book.enderstorage_chest.page: This glyph lets you access chests on the EnderStorage Network.$(br2)It is best to use the $(l:spells/self)Form Self$() for this Effect. Though others do work, they might have a delay or don't fire at all if they don't hit.
ars_nouveau.book.enderstorage_break.page: This glyph lets you break blocks and move them into a chest on the EnderStorage Network.$(br2)The same Augments as for $(l:spells/break)Break$() can also be used here:$(li)$(l:spells/amplify)Amplify$() to increase harvest level. $(li)$(l:spells/aoe)AOE$() to increase the radius of blocks broken. $(li)$(l:spells/pierce)Pierce$() will target blocks behind the one the spell hits.

$(li)$(l:spells/extract)Extract$() applies a silk-touch effect (cannot be combined with fortune). $(li)$(l:spells/fortune)Fortune$() increases the drop chance for applicable blocks (cannot be combined with silk-touch). $(li)$(l:spells/sensitive)Sensitive$() will simulate breaking blocks with Shears instead of a pickaxe.
ars_nouveau.book.enderstorage_place.page: This glyph lets you place blocks that are currently in a chest on the EnderStorage Network.$(br2)The same Augments as for $(l:spells/place_block)Place Block$() can also be used here:$(br) $(li)$(l:spells/aoe)AOE$() to increase the radius of blocks broken. $(li)$(l:spells/pierce)Pierce$() will target blocks behind the one the spell hits.
ars_nouveau.book.enderstorage_tank.page1: This glyph lets use a tank on the EnderStorage Network like a bucket, to pick up and place liquids.$(br2)The $(l:spells/aoe)AOE$() can be used to increase the radius.
ars_nouveau.book.enderstorage.page.attun: To attune your spell to the right Frequency you can use up to 3 $(l:ars_enderstorage:ender_storage/color_augments)Color Augments$(). If you have less than 3 Augments, the rest will be filled with White.$(br2)e.g.:$(br)Using only 1 $(#f00)Red$() Glyph results in the Frequency $(#f00)Red$()-White-White.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.enderstorage_brea: Break blocks and move them to an EnderStorage Chest. Can be amplified to increase the harvest level. Sensitive will simulate breaking blocks with Shears instead of a pickaxe.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.enderstorage_plac: Place Block from an EnderStorage Chest.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.enderstorage_tank: Place liquids / pick up liquids from / to an EnderStorage tank. Projectiles can not target liquids for picking up and Touch only with sensitive.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.color_black: Attunes the previous spell to the Black Color Frequency.
ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.color_blue: Attunes the previous spell to the Blue Color Frequency.

ars_nouveau.glyph_desc.color_light_blue: Attunes the previous spell to the Light Blue Color Frequency.
item.ars_nouveau.glyph_color_light_blue: Glyph of Light Blue Color Frequency
